fields.description:
When deploying to Android 3.X and 4.X Emulators, an app restart dialog appears intermittently. The app restarts if 'restart' is pressed.

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Creata and launch app in emulator.

Expected Result:

App should run.

Actual Result:

Intermittent app restart prompt.
fields.summary: Android: 3.X and 4.X Emulator: Intermittent app restart required on launch
fields.environment:
SDK: 2.0.0.v20120328183230
Android: V8
Studio: 2.0.0.201203290942
OS: Snow Leopard, Ubuntu 11.10, Windows 7
Devices Tested: Emulator 3.0, Emulator 4.0

comments.body:
Bug persists.

Studio: 2.0.2.201205292259
SDK: 2.0.2.v20120530102130
Android Runtime: V8
Android Emulator: 3.0
OS: Snow Leopard, Lion, Windows 7
Closing in favor of the newer TIMOB-10306, for which I put in the launch intent flags that will prevent this.
